document_data.name: Balix
document_data.mainbody: '''Balix''' was a prisoner at the [[Fane of the Eye]] under [[Tyar-Besil]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Personality: The [[drow]] was a [[wizard]] and a historian.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], he went with a scout companion to check the Fane but they were ambushed by the [[Cult of the Howling Hatred]]. Balix was captured and the scout killed. He remained a prisoner of some air cultists and a [[nycaloth]] until some adventurers infiltrated the Fane, killing the cultists, and freed him.
